mapper.select: select id, staff_id, staff_name, staff_gender, is_resigned, resign_time, staff_age, staff_phone, staff_email, staff_adress, organize_id, staff_position, entry_time from organize_staff where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into organize_staff(staff_id, staff_name, staff_gender, is_resigned, resign_time, staff_age, staff_phone, staff_email, staff_adress, organize_id, staff_position, entry_time) values (#{staffId}, #{staffName}, #{staffGender}, #{isResigned}, #{resignTime}, #{staffAge}, #{staffPhone}, #{staffEmail}, #{staffAdress}, #{organizeId}, #{staffPosition}, #{entryTime})

insert into organize_staff(staff_id, staff_name, staff_gender, is_resigned, resign_time, staff_age, staff_phone, staff_email, staff_adress, organize_id, staff_position, entry_time) values
(#{entity.staffId}, #{entity.staffName}, #{entity.staffGender}, #{entity.isResigned}, #{entity.resignTime}, #{entity.staffAge}, #{entity.staffPhone}, #{entity.staffEmail}, #{entity.staffAdress}, #{entity.organizeId}, #{entity.staffPosition}, #{entity.entryTime})

insert into organize_staff(staff_id, staff_name, staff_gender, is_resigned, resign_time, staff_age, staff_phone, staff_email, staff_adress, organize_id, staff_position, entry_time) values
(#{entity.staffId}, #{entity.staffName}, #{entity.staffGender}, #{entity.isResigned}, #{entity.resignTime}, #{entity.staffAge}, #{entity.staffPhone}, #{entity.staffEmail}, #{entity.staffAdress}, #{entity.organizeId}, #{entity.staffPosition}, #{entity.entryTime})
on duplicate key update staff_id = values(staff_id), staff_name = values(staff_name), staff_gender = values(staff_gender), is_resigned = values(is_resigned), resign_time = values(resign_time), staff_age = values(staff_age), staff_phone = values(staff_phone), staff_email = values(staff_email), staff_adress = values(staff_adress), organize_id = values(organize_id), staff_position = values(staff_position), entry_time = values(entry_time)
mapper.update:
update organize_staff
staff_id = #{staffId},
staff_name = #{staffName},
staff_gender = #{staffGender},
is_resigned = #{isResigned},
resign_time = #{resignTime},
staff_age = #{staffAge},
staff_phone = #{staffPhone},
staff_email = #{staffEmail},
staff_adress = #{staffAdress},
organize_id = #{organizeId},
staff_position = #{staffPosition},
entry_time = #{entryTime},
where id = #{id}
